column2: BREAKING: Pfizer covid vaccine approved for 12-15 age group
column5: Hopefully the CDC finalize their release in the next couple of days and kids in this age group will be able to start getting their shots this week. IMHO this is the key for getting schools open and keeping them open. If you have or know of kids in this age group now is the time to find look for where this particular shot is available in your area Full story here www.msn.com/…
